title: Episode 82 - One Piece Wiki

title: Dalton - One Piece Wiki

notes: Detailed character information about Dalton including his Devil Fruit abilities, role in Drum Kingdom, and character development throughout the arc.

title: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Comprehensive information about Dalton's Devil Fruit including its abilities, debut episode, and how it compares to other Zoan fruits. Clarified that Episode 82 was when the fruit's name was officially revealed.

title: BEFORE DAWN - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about the BEFORE DAWN ending theme including artist (Ai-Sachi), episode range (82-94), English dub vocalist (Carli Mosier), and animation description. Confirmed Episode 82 was the first episode to use this ending.

title: Drum Island Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Arc overview providing context for Episode 82's events within the broader Drum Island narrative, including information about character motivations and plot progression.

title: Isshi-100 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about the Isshi-20 doctors who debut in Episode 82, including their role serving Wapol and their exceptional medical skills. The page also mentions they later become the Isshi-100.

title: Chess - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Character information about Chess including his role as Wapol's Minister of Defense, his archery abilities, and his attack on Dalton in Episode 82.
